The objective of this game is to find as many Thric3s as possible. A Thric3 consists of three cards with special properties as explained below.
The game is played with 81 cards. Each card has four properties which can have three values each:

Color: red, green or blue
Shape: clubs, hearts or diamonds
Number: one, two or three
Filling: empty, half or full
A valid Thric3 consists of three cards which are either all equal or all different in each of these four properties. This is an example of a valid Thric3.
This is not a valid Thric3, because two of these cards are green and one is blue. This tutorial will help you learn how to recognize valid Thric3s.
If you have found a Thric3, press this button and select the cards of the Thric3 you found. Then press the button again to confirm.
If you cannot find any Thric3, press this button to deal three additional cards. Up to 21 cards can be in the game at the same time. 21 cards always contain at least one Thric3.
